page.title: 02Industry in Killyleagh.
page.content: " The Tannery." The Atlantic Tanning} Company, known locally as "the Tannery," is very important to Killyleagh. Its work force is mainly from the Killyleagh area. At least 120 workers are local of whom 26% are women. They work a shift system from 08.00 hours to 17.00 hours and 14.00 hours to 24.00 hours. The Tannery exports goods world wide, but most are bought by the home market in the United Kingdom. They usually transport their goods by lorry and sea, but occasionally by air. The Tannery only produces the basic leather with the colour added, it is the purchaser who then turns it into the required article such as shoes and coats. Every week the Tannery produces between 15000 and 18000 square feet of leather.
